scenarios.name: Register new user and then reset password for user
Reset password for a email that does not have an account

steps.text: I go to the reset password page and try to reset the password.
I will receive an not found error.

scenarios.name: Register new user and then and then reset password for user with an expired OTP code

steps.text: I reset the password by waiting for the first OTP to expire.

scenarios.name: Register new user and then reset password for user then login

steps.text: I log in with the new password.

scenarios.name: Register new user and then reset password for user then login with old password

steps.text: I log in with the old password.
I should get an error for invalid password.

scenarios.name: Register new user and then try to reset password with invalid password

steps.text: I enter a invalid password for password reset.
I will get an invalid password error.
